name: Brooke Erickson
text: Food is delicious, no problems there. My only problem is the delivery driver. He didn‚Äôt follow the delivery instructions, he called me and told me he was outside then hung up, which I thought was rude. It was suppose to be a contactless ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Hill
text: This place is my favored. I eat in many restaurants but to this restaurant I keep coming back again and again. The crew is very welcoming and the food they cook is so good. I am always happy to have a decent dinner in this restaurant. I recommend this place with pleasure.

name: Rebecca Tawyea
text: Disgusted that I ordered  from there Friday Night and I assumed working with food they would be practicing safety measures however not one person had a mask on and they were training a bunch of new people, there were at least 10 people in the back nobody being safe. Very disappointed, I thought we were a bit smarter here in Hartford.

name: Uncle Remmi
text: Better than Domino's and Little Caesars.

name: Jen D
text: Kudos goes out to Pizza Hut tonight for handling an issue with class and great service! Ordered for delivery and got the text update at 9:22 saying my order is out for delivery. Great! I'm 5 min from the store. 30 min later, called Pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Claude Springer
text: God tier Chicken Alfredo and Sausage Pizza. Also nice people who work there with respect. Pizza Hut will always be amazing and leave my taste buds feeling happy.

name: Kurt Meyers
text: Pizza was good and hot

name: Dawn Lynch
text: Onions Were the skin of the onion~not sure was it payback bcuz we got a free one?! And the boneless chicken were fatty

name: Stephanie Arndt
text: It's Pizza Hut. I was unsure if there was seating available until we came... There are about 6-8 chairs and two small tables. It's really just for walk in and take out pizza. But you could dine in here, as long as you're ok with buying bottled water or soda, and plastic utensils. :) Service was just fine.

name: Jaysin P. Becker
text: Lot of these reviews sound like people looking for free stuff/discounts? Never had an issue with this pizza hut.

name: Anna Golownia
text: Amazing service and the staff is wonderful!!

name: Courtney Kienbaum
text: RJ is literally the best worker you have. He deserves all of the raises!!!! Us at US Cellular appreciate him more than he'll ever know!

name: Glen Dornacker
text: Pricey and greasy but once in a while I like greasy food lol

name: NickToonz Z
text: Pizza was ok not the greatest the Pizza Hut down the street is better

name: William Ehrhardt
text: Great pizza every time and very friendly staff that acknowledge my daughter and support her reading with a free personal pan pizza. The best way to benefit and lower the price you pay is order online and pickup.

name: andria limburg
text: I just moved to Hartford and decided to order a quick easy dinner. Due to the heavy snow and bitter cold I expected my food to be late and probably cold. The food was warm and delicious. The driver was beyond apologetic for being around 10 minutes late. Wonderful first experience and will definitely be ordering again.

name: Len Swestka
text: Good service and marvelous meat lovers pizza.

name: Rurik Miller
text: I came in for my carryout. Numnut has me sign the recipt and then without a word just walked way. I stood there for a good while unsure if he was getting my pizza or taken a bathroom break. C'MON MAN. Ya'll need better comunication skills. ‚Ä¶More

name: Colleen Korpi
text: This is a great pizza hut. They are fast and very friendly too.

name: Scott-Deb Lackas-Wallace
text: Fast friendly service. Even a few small tables to sit at for a quick lunch.

name: Rico Life
text: I wouldn't even give one star but that is the only way I could leave a review.  I ordered pizza about an hour and a half ago, just called to see where it is and they stated the driver will be back in about 15 minutes and our pizza has been in the warmer. No thanks I dont want some stale pizza!!!! I will never go through them again!

name: johnathan swindoll
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery when i got it it had mushrooms called to complain wzs told its my fault and was hung up on the lady manager was a real witch which i guess is fitting since Halloween is soon

name: Patrick Terch
text: Hot and fresh

name: John Schneider Jr
text: Got Delivery and they forgot to cut my pizza. Who does that? also got a GF pizza and they just threw the toppings on carelessly. But it was in the time they said, and tasted good so overall ok.

name: Nicole Schuster
text: Ordered two pizzas for delivery and it took them an HOUR to get them to me, no updates either, I had to call and ask for one, even though I asked for text updates and watched the tracker. Both of which stated that I should only have had to wait 22-32 minutes. Seriously dissatisfied, no apologies or anything either for how long it took.

name: Chuck Norris
text: Most of these negative reviews are about the delivery service mine is about the restaurant itself. The food might be greasy but it is very good. The restaurant is a little dark and the layout is not that good. The service is pretty good though i didn't have any problems.

name: Jacquelyn Boone

text: The person who was on the phone with me hung up on me in the middle of the order. Not impressed.

name: Mike Plaza
text: Pizza Hut has really gone down hill, especially the delivery. The past few times the pizza has arrived it wasn't even what I would consider warm. Sal's Pizza in Hartford is so much better than this place. I've complained a few times but nothing seems to change.
